title.rendered: Is Your Funeral Home on a Solid Accounting Platform?

content.rendered:
Do you have financial information at your fingertips when you need it?

Is your financial information in-line with industry standards?

Are you working in your business instead of on it?

Are you paying too much for IT Support and Accounting?

It may be time for a change!

Johnson Consulting Group can help!

An industry specific accounting system designed by the leading consulting firm for the funeral profession

JCG Accounting Services offers clients the most effective yet practical financial management tools available including comprehensive accounting services: state of the art information management systems: timely, accurate financial statements: customized management reports: and analysis by Johnson Consulting Group’s financial and operation experts. This gives you the ability to take strategic action to maximize profitability ensuring optimum business valuation.

Johnson Consulting Group Account Services Provide:

  • 24/7 Web-Based Access
  • Complete set-up, training and continuous ongoing support
  • Real Time Financial Data
  • Reconciled Financials Posted on JCG’s Secure Data Website for Easy Access
  • Trend Analysis Reports (Modified P&L)
  • Signature Monthly Reports that Help You Manage Your Funeral Business
  • Benchmarked Performance Comparisons
  • Budgeting Support

It’s not just accounting, It’s a complete financial management tool!

JCG’s Accounting Services Program was developed by funeral home and cemetery financial and operation experts who have successfully owned and operated hundreds of funeral homes throughout the country. Benefit from our experience and gain a competitive advantage – Call us Today!

Johnson Consulting Group

“A Total Solutions Company”
